plot outline: This romantic tale follows Aandava Perumal aka Sarathy (Shivan) who falls in love with Anita (Idhaya), but she rejects him. A day before her wedding, Anita gets into a quarrel with a thug Ravi (Sasi) after he misbehaves with her friend. As Ravi's men try to capture her, Sarathy comes to her rescue.
